page.title: 14Schools.
page.content: All are state schools and are in 2868 and 2968.{Gracemount High School} (G.H.S.) is the only senior secondary school.It is "fed" mainly by{ {Burdiehouse Primary,Gracemount Primary and{Gilmerton Primary.} Just alongside G.H.S.is{Kaimes School. This is a Special School originally for partially-sighted pupils,though it now also has some pupils with other problems.Total roll varies from 70-90 including primary and secondary pupils There are 45 secondary pupils at present. For some practical subjects these pupils join G.H.S.classes. The old Gilmerton Primary building at the corner of Drum St and Newtoft St is now a Community Centre.Hyvots Bank Primary School closed when land subsidence occurred in the late 1970s. At 292687 there's a residential school for girls with behaviuor problems.
